title: Introducing League of Legends: League of Origin

replies.body: What do you think that there is only Queensland, New South Wales, and Victoria in the Australia?? Better check your map RITO there are other states or we not hip enough for League?

Hey there! As this is the first year we're running this tournament we decided to start small with the most populous regions. If there's demand and a good talent pool from other regions we'll absolutely re-evaluate this in the future
theres a thing called south australia and wester Australia and uno northern teritory

> [{quoted}](name=CptStupendous,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=z4WERqke,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-03-30T06:19:36.357+0000)
>
> Hey there! As this is the first year we're running this tournament we decided to start small with the most populous regions. If there's demand and a good talent pool from other regions we'll absolutely re-evaluate this in the future

hello there, i hear you're a filthy corrupted piece of shit

have a nice day

> [{quoted}](name=AC Z DC,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=z4WERqke,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-30T06:09:12.499+0000)
>
> What do you think that there is only Queensland, New South Wales, and Victoria in the Australia?? Better check your map RITO there are other states or we not hip enough for League?

I don't even know what region you are from, so you are not putting up a very good argument for your region to be included. Maybe if you could list the players from your region who have actually played in the OPL or OCS you may have a better chance of being included
Have you never watched State of Origin? And you do know what states have NRL teams right? Hence the whole "League of Origin". We already have Oceania which covers Australia as a whole and others.
wow so online we are playing rugby now?

Let's be real though. Perth is the most isolated capital city on earth. Majority of the Northern Territory, a good chunk of central Australia and North Western Australia don't have the sort of resources to hold these events. Take international bands for example, they announce an Australian tour and play 15-20 east coast shows and maybe half of them will actually be places anyone's ever heard of
Perth has better gamers here then the rest of Australia mate.

Ok, well to qualify play, as stated in the post, you need to be in the OPL or OCS. If you can get suggest the 5 players from these competition who are from Western Australia, then I don't see why there shouldn't be a team, but I don't think there are enough players. But if you'd like to prove me wrong, go ahead and name them
maybe we should separate from you assholes and you go without our money huh?
Queensland, New South Wales, and Victoria are all that matter in Australia. You should know this by now
How to disenfranchise players 101: literally don't represent half of them.

@ CptStupendous

Really dude the guys that are above are from the OLP series on Saturday's and Sunday's shows, no brainer there. So that tells me that you have left us high and dry. I can see why you choose those states ahy. Don't have to be a rocket scientist to work that out. {{champion:31}}
Isn't there a statistic that 80% of Australians live on the eastern coast?
this looks and sounds like a lot of fun can't wait for tickets  lol

Well I think this is a great idea. As you can see people are very territorial.

Maybe if more people knew where the players actually came from they would be more inclined to watch the OPL (and this tournament).

I don't think that people who don't even watch it should really be commenting.
Should release some special skins for this event
We can't do this, but wow it would be awesome!
Maroon Chromas
easy win for new zealand XD
Come on! Let's hop on the Crunch train.  Toot toot!
I saw some icons that represented each team, will players be able to get them as Summoner Icons?

**I see what you did there** 

GJ
Lets be real they will all be Asian players.
RACIST. Wheres the aboriginals and maori? #bubblewrappedsociety
nice bait mate, rate it 8/8
So aboriginals arent australian? And maoris and New zealander?

If you are in the OPL or OCS and are from the states included, you qualify to play. Please point me to the Aboriginal or Maori player from either of these competitions who is being excluded due to their race and we can fight racism together.
Look, I don't care if you have a doctorate. Wolves aren't people, so just hush.
Wheres Western Australia? and other states really...?
jeez they even have their own construction and retail standrards.... they're not even AUSTRALIA!
if you check out currencies new zealand even has it's own currency.........

yea it is abit stupid, new zealand is actually it's own country not australia at all for 1 and for 2 more peoiple in westerns aus and south aus play league more than new zealand people.... pretty obvious this league of origin has not been thought out at all.
i'm sad no south Australia and u don't let western Australia as well thats fucked up
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Rito, I think your map is outdated...



It has New Zealand on it

Coming from dota 3.2 where we can really say alot of it started to take off, i've been around moba and lol for over 10 years now. I need to switch machines for stable hardware and dust off some skills, get back into team synergy zones... But highest i've been is D2 in NA from s1-3. Retired gaming for a bit from s4-early 6 and been araming my mechanics through the roof. Feel free to drop me a msg in game or email- shane-nilsson82@outlook.com, highly intelligent and aware, analytical and intuitive as well as familiar with pre-meta strategy and how to bait the current system which seems to think korean machine like play is the only way to go.
